attributes.action: Make stealing a family pet an offence with a jail term attached
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Family pets are important members of the family.  They are living beings and deserve to have rights.  Stealing a member of the family is a deadful thing to do.  Dogs in particular need their pack/family, and if you are lucky enough to have a dog in your family, they mean the world to you.

To steal a family pet, should be a very serious offence, not just treated as theft of an object.  A pet is not just an object, it is family!  Your family!  It deserves protection under the law!  

Please sign my petition and push animal rights to the next level.

Thank you
